page.title: 01COLD ASHTON PARISH, AVON.
page.content: Our area is a very rural area though only about 8 miles from the centre of{Bristol,}to the west , and 5 miles from{Bath,}to the South. Part of it forms the southern end of the Cotswolds and, from Tog Hill, there are panoramic views across Bristol to Wales and the Severn Estuary. Except for the village of{Cold {Ashton}(and this is small) there is no development of any sort, except for the odd farm house, old cottages and 2 pubs. There are 2 busy main{roads passing through the area from Bristol to London and Bath to the M4 and Cheltenham. The few people living in the area are very supportive of each other as they have to travel for any amenity they require. {
